tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE driving_data (
   driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   driving_date DATE,
   distance_km FLOAT,
   avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
   incidents INT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_driving_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	driver_license VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
	date_of_trip DATE,
	start_location VARCHAR(100),
	end_location VARCHAR(100),
	distance_km DECIMAL(10, 2),
	duration_minutes INT,
	average_speed_km_per_hr DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE safety_improvements (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	safety_measure VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	implementation_date DATE,
	impact_on_safety VARCHAR(200),
	related_driving_data_id INT REFERENCES historical_driving_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_driving_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_id INT,
	date DATE,
	distance INT,
	speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE driver_profile (
	driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_name VARCHAR(50),
	driver_license VARCHAR(20),
	dob DATE,
	driver_experience INT
);

CREATE TABLE driving_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  speed INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  license_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  year INT,
  color VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance FLOAT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE accidents (
  accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  details TEXT,
  severity VARCHAR(20),
  report_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE,
  details TEXT
)
